devdoc.author: Joseph Reed
devdoc.details: The PaymentDelegate acts as a hub for sending and recieving payments. The payment contract is responsible      for registering any recipients it has.

params.i: The index of the payment to fetch

getIncomingPayments(address).return: The list of incoming payments associated with the 'recipient'

params.i: The index of the payment to fetch

params.wallet: The delegated wallet for which we are fetching outgoing payment

getOutgoingPayments(address).return: The list of outgoing payments associated with the 'wallet'

params.recipient: The account for which we are fetching the number of incoming payment

getTotalIncomingPayments(address).return: The number of incoming payments associated with the 'recipient'

params.wallet: The delegated wallet for which we are fetching the number of outgoing payment

getTotalOutgoingPayments(address).return: The number of outgoing payments associated with the 'wallet'

recipientContainsPayment(address,address.return: True if the given 'recipient' contains the given 'payment'

params.payment: The payment contract responsible for holding logic and data about the payment

params.amount: The amount of tokens to send to the recipient
params.recipient: The recipient of the specified amount of tokens
params.token: The token to send for the payment

transfer(address,address,uint256).return: True if the payment executed successfully

params.payment: The payment contract responsible for holding logic and data about the payment

walletContainsPayment(address,address).return: True if the given 'wallet' contains the given 'payment'

devdoc.title: PaymentDelegate Contract

getIncomingPaymentAtIndex(address,uint25.notice: Fetches the incoming payments of a given recipient at a given index

getIncomingPayments(address).notice: Fetches the incoming payments of a given recipient

getOutgoingPaymentAtIndex(address,uint25.notice: Fetches the outgoing payments of a given delegated wallet at a given index

getOutgoingPayments(address).notice: Fetches the outgoing payments of a given delegated wallet

getTotalIncomingPayments(address).notice: Fetches the total number of incoming payments of a given recipient

getTotalOutgoingPayments(address).notice: Fetches the total number of outgoing payments of a given delegated wallet

recipientContainsPayment(address,address.notice: Indicated whether an account currently is associated with an incoming payment

schedule(address).notice: Schedules a payment. Only callable by a wallet delegate

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Executes the payment associated with the address of 'msg.sender'

unschedule().notice: Unschedules a payment. Only callable by the payment contract

unschedule(address).notice: Unschedules a payment. Only callable by a delegate of the wallet supplied with the payment

walletContainsPayment(address,address).notice: Indicated whether an account currently is associated with an outgoing payment
